name: HLA Basic Test 2016
description: Basic CS/SOM and Best Practices compliance

requirements.description: SuT shall provide attribute value updates for requested attributes owned by the SuT
SuT shall create a federation execution before joining, if it does not already exist
SuT shall create or join a federation execution with only those FOM modules that are specified in CS
SuT shall be configurable for the following parameters: FederateType, FederateName, FederationName
SuT shall remove at least one object instance if RemoveObjectInstance HLA service is described as used in CS/SOM
SuT shall resign federation if ResignFederation HLA service is described as used in CS/SOM
SuT shall only update values, for attributes with Enumerated Datatype, compliant with Distributed Simulation Agreement
SuT interoperability capabilities shall be documented in a Conformance Statement including a SOM and a FOM with a minimum set of supporting FOM modules
SuT CS/SOM shall be valid
SuT CS/SOM shall be consistent
SuT shall publish all object class attributes defined as published in CS/SOM
SuT shall not publish any object class attribute that is not defined as published in CS/SOM
SuT shall publish all interaction classes defined as published is CS/SOM
SuT shall not publish any interaction class that is not defined as published is CS/SOM
SuT shall subscribe to all object class attributes defined as subscribed in CS/SOM
SuT shall not subscribe to any object class attribute that is not defined as subscribed in CS/SOM
SuT shall subscribe to all interaction classes defined as subscribed in CS/SOM
SuT shall not subscribe to any interaction class that is not defined as subscribed in CS/SOM
SuT shall register at least one object instance for each published object class
SuT shall discover object instances for all object classes with attributes defined as subscribed in CS/SOM
SuT shall update attribute values for each published object class attribute
SuT shall reflect attribute values for each subscribed object class attribute
SuT shall send at least one interaction for each published interaction class
SuT shall receive interactions for each subscribed interaction class
SuT shall encode all updated attribute values according to CS/SOM
SuT shall encode all sent interaction class parameters according to CS/SOM
SuT shall implement/use all HLA services as described as implemented/used in CS/SOM
SuT shall not implement/use any HLA service that is not described as implemented/used in CS/SOM
